channel.title: Cadence Innovation - HCR
channel.description: Stories related to the Human Capital Request System.

item.title: Chat with the developer
item.description:
Human Resources Only
Every page now contains a new chat link that will allow you to chat with me live. Click the link labeled Cadence Chat at the bottom of the page. A window will pop up and allow you to chat if I'm online or leave a message if offline.

When using the chat application can you first let me know who I'm talking to and the application in question.
item.dc:creator: Tom LeZotte
